ca.nehil.rter.streamingapp2
Class FFmpegFrameSender

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.javacv.FrameRecorder
      ca.nehil.rter.streamingapp2.FFmpegFrameSender

public class FFmpegFrameSender
extends com.googlecode.javacv.FrameRecorder

Encodes images and audio samples into an H264 MPEG-TS stream, and sends as packets over HTTP.

Author:
Samuel Audet, Michael Sterle-Contala

Constructor Detail

FFmpegFrameSender

public FFmpegFrameSender(java.lang.String rterResource,
                         java.lang.String rterToken,
                         int imageWidth,
                         int imageHeight)
Constructor for video only (no audio).

Parameters:
rterResource - URL for videoserver endpoint to send to
rterToken - authorization token for videoserver
imageWidth - image width in pixels
imageHeight - image height in pixels

FFmpegFrameSender

public FFmpegFrameSender(java.lang.String rterResource,
                         java.lang.String rterToken,
                         int imageWidth,
                         int imageHeight,
                         int audioChannels)
Constructor for video with audio.

Parameters:
rterResource - URL for videoserver endpoint to send to
rterToken - authorization token for videoserver
imageWidth - image width in pixels
imageHeight - image height in pixels
audioChannels - number of audio channels
